title: client issue please help!
body: This morning after an update i opened up LoL to find myself stuck in an infinite loop at patching so i ran League as an administrator and i was able to play a few games before the same problem came back this time even as admin the problem was not solved so i uninstalled and reinstalled but now in the client im receiving a message "Unspecified error has occurred, Please check logs for more information". So that's what i did, but honestly i have no idea what any of this means but there were alot of "ERROR" and "WARN". So if any help could be offered it would be greatly appreciated, guess im missing URF weekend {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I'm having the EXACT same issue as OP.

It almost sounds like your client may have lost it's admin privileges if you were able to play normally after running the client as administrator. Let's set up your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) again using that guide, and let me know if that helps you get back on the Rift for ARURF!
Appreciate the fast response! Although the client is updating again? And is now stuck at 1 file scanned 33%

Only a single file scanned and it's sitting at 33% o_O, yea that's odd. Let's get you in touch with some of our techies in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they'll be able to look over some of your logs to see what might be going on!
I'm also getting this message but running it in administrator mode isn't working for me.
anywho thanks for the help amigo
